cast.overview: Following the tragic death of her teenage son, Manuela travels from Madrid to Barcelona in an attempt to contact the long-estranged father the boy never knew. She reunites with an old friend, an outspoken transgender sex worker, and befriends a troubled actress and a pregnant, HIV-positive nun.
cast.title: All About My Mother

cast.original_title: Mujeres al borde de un ataque de nervios
cast.overview: Pepa resolves to kill herself with a batch of sleeping-pill-laced gazpacho after her lover leaves her. Fortunately, she is interrupted by a deliciously chaotic series of events.
cast.title: Women on the Verge of a Nervous Breakdown

details.biography: Fernando Guillén was born on November 22, 1932 in Barcelona, Barcelona, Catalonia, Spain as Fernando Gallego Guillén. He was an actor, known for Todo sobre mi madre(1999), Mujeres al borde de un ataque de "nervios" (1988) and La ley del deseo (1987). He was married to Gemma Cuervo. He died on January 17, 2013 in Madrid, Comunidad de Madrid, Spain.
details.name: Fernando Guillén
